title: What is YMK?
subtitle: A fast, modern way to connect and build your own digital Vibe.

steps.title: No Passwords
steps.text: Sign in with your personal associations — no passwords, codes, or emails. Only what matters to you.

steps.title: Private & Secure
steps.text: Your data is encrypted and never shared. Only you control access.

steps.title: Fast Authentication
steps.text: Quick access with your answers — no codes or password resets.

steps.title: Your Vibe, Your Rules
steps.text: Your digital Vibe is all about you. Share contacts, links, and more on your own terms.

mission: YMK was built for those who value simplicity and privacy. Forget dozens of passwords and unnecessary data — your digital world, under your control.
